 2008-14972008-08-26,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of BILL BARKLEY of Victoria, British Columbia, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum for Human Rights to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
